definition.text: A plugin file is the JSON file that constitutes the plugin. In the context of the plugins hierarchy, a plugin is the definition of a hierarchy.

paragraphs.text: Plugin files distributed with the system are stored in the corresponding folders on the following path: \Projects\[ProjectName]\Plugins\.
To create a plugin and make it available to the system you need to:
1. Take a backup of the hierarchy.
2. Place it in the proper folder of the path.
